    • Method Detail

      • showAlert

        public static boolean showAlert(java.lang.String title,
                                java.lang.String header,
                                java.lang.String message,
                                javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType type)
        Show an alert with a certain message and a given type.
        Parameters:
        String - title: title of alert, could be null
        String - header: header for the alert, could be null
        String - message: longer message further describing the alert, could be null (though all three above shouldn't be null at the same time or the alert is useless)
        AlertType - type: type of alert to display, i.e. ERROR, INFORMATION, CONFIRMATION
        Returns:
        boolean result.get() == ButtonType.OK: returns true is the user clicked the OK button, returns false otherwise

      • showError

        public static void showError(java.lang.String title,
                             java.lang.String message)
        Show an error with a certain message.
        Parameters:
        error - message

      • makeButton

        public static javafx.scene.control.Button makeButton(java.lang.String name,
                                                     javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> handler)
        Makes a button with a given name and event.
        Parameters:
        String - name: name of button
        EventHandler - handler: action/method to occur when button is pressed
        Returns:
        Button button: the button node tied to its name and event

      • promptAndGetFile

        public static java.io.File promptAndGetFile(javafx.stage.FileChooser.ExtensionFilter extension,
                                            java.lang.String prompt)
        Prompts a file chooser box for the user to choose a file with ONE extension filter
        Parameters:
        ExtensionFilter - extension: file extension that the user can choose from, all others are not allowed
        String - prompt: prompt for the file chooser box
        Returns:
        File: return file selected by the user Note: this method works with promptAndGetFile(List filters, String prompt), which allows the addition of multiple extension filters, whereas this method is called with only one extension filter is needed; pairing the methods reduces replicated code

      • promptAndGetFile

        public static java.io.File promptAndGetFile(java.util.List<javafx.stage.FileChooser.ExtensionFilter> filters,
                                            java.lang.String prompt)
        Prompts a file chooser box for the user to choose a file with MULTIPLE extension filters
        Parameters:
        List - filters: file extensions that the user can choose from, all others are not allowed
        String - prompt: prompt for the file chooser box
        Returns:
        File file: return file selected by the user

      • makeSlider

        public static javafx.scene.control.Slider makeSlider(javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<java.lang.Number> listener,
                                                     double start,
                                                     double end,
                                                     double currVal)
        Creates a new slider, setting all necessary intervals and locations.
        Parameters:
        ChangeListener - the changeImage the slider is listening to and event/method it calls when the changeImage occurs
        start - the start of the slider range
        end - the end of the slider range
        incr - the increment of the slider range
        Returns:
        slider the new slider
